divs: sighting detailsat about 10:50pm on saturday august 2nd 2013, my wife and i saw an unknown object project what appeared be a beam multiple times as it traversed the sky. it traveled straight in a west\nw direction. it would be about the same illumination as a high plane at night then suddenly light up brilliantly as if projecting a beam or "bursting" into flame. i watched the object travel for about 45secs to a min. almost reminded me of meteor footage i've seen but moved way to slowly for a meteor.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Forest Grove
There were no other sightings in Forest Grove on or around August 3rd 2013
